text:
Better defaults could be included. Specifically, defaults for java.util.logging could be added.

level==severe
level==warning
level==info
level==config
level==fine
level==finer
level==finest

http://sourceforge.net/project/screenshots.php?group_id=209609
creator: hammy_the_man@hotmail.com

text: I've improved the default colors (svn r776608) but I didn't add default rules supporting java.util.logging levels.  Let me know if that's sufficient (hopefully we'd have additional users requesting default rules, since they're pretty easy to add).
creator: sdeboy@iname.com
